page.title: 06The Club
page.content: The 'Club', the Working Men's Club, is the centre of all social life of the area. The Steward and his wife organise many outings and trips to the seaside and country. They oversee all the various sporting activities that go on; football, cricket, darts, snooker and of course fishing. Many youth teams are operated and boys and girls are initiated into adult life through their involvement with the Club. It is also a social centre where people meet and just chat, play bingo and watch the many concerts and 'turns' that are put on.
